titleStmt.title: The petition and remonstrance of the governovr and Company of merchants of London trading to the East-Indies, exhibited to the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons, in the high court of Parliament assembled
titleStmt.author: East India Company.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The remonstrance of the East-India Company.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
